title: Vijay 61: Ilayathalapathy Vijay to don khaki in Atlee's next? : Regional cinema, News - India Today
text:
A + A - A still from Theri 
Vijay has an interesting line-up this year. The Pokkiri actor is joining hands with Atlee for a Tamil film. Post Atlee's project, Ilayathalapathy is teaming up with AR Murugadoss for the third time for Vijay 62. 
While the shooting of Vijay 61 is going in full swing, it is rumoured that the Theri actor is playing a cop after Pokkiri, Thuppakki and Theri. 
According to Behindwoods , the project is likely to feature Vijay in multiple roles and that he would be donning a khaki for one of the roles. 
A picture of Vijay on the sets of the film went viral on the internet. The team is currently shooting in Madurai. 
Produced by Sri Thenandal Films, the highlight of the film is its huge cast, which includes Kajal Aggarwal, Samantha, Nithya Menen, SJ Suryah and Sathyaraj. 
To be made on a lavish budget, Academy Award-winner AR Rahman is on board to compose the music. 
Magadheera, Baahubali and Bajrangi Bhaijaan writer KV Vijayendra Prasad has penned the script for the film. 
Despite opening to poor reviews from critics and audience, Vijay's Pongal release Bairavaa is the first Tamil film to gross Rs 100-crore mark this year.
